title: Post Game: Climate axed from reconciliation bill
description: NBC News Senior Capitol Hill Correspondent Garrett Haake joins Chuck after Meet the Press wraps to discuss news that climate change provisions are likely getting dropped from the Democrats’ spending plan. Plus, how serious is Matthew McConaughey about running for Texas governor?
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
